properties.author: Gunther Van Roey

section.name: JSpider ANT script
section.p: This page gives you an overview of our 'build.xml' ant script and its targets. If you're going to use a binary download, you don't have to worry about this. This file is only used when building JSpider from source.

subsection.name: Targets
subsection.p:
These public targets are defined:
targetdescription
cleanremoves any artifacts from previous builds
buildSimplethe default target. Builds jspider. Any JUnit test failure will cause the build to fail
buildCompleteBuilds jspider and generates documentatio and reports. JUnit test failures don't cause the build to fail in order to be able to generate the reports
buildDistroSmae as buildComplete, but also creates distribution packages
testTechnicalRuns the JUnit test suite that can be run without an environment or internet connection (basic code-level tests)
testFunctionalRuns the JUnit test suite that tests jspider as a whole. Needs a properly built and configured jspider instance and an internet connectio
testInteractiveStarts the familiar JUnit swing UI
generateJUnitDocsGenerates JUnit test reports from info generated by testTechnical of testFunctional
generateFullDocsGenerates JUnit test reports, todo docs, api docs, ...
